titles.title: Congratulating the University of Illinois Fighting Illini men's tennis team for its successful season.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

action.text: Mr. McKeon moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/18/2003--Passed House without amendment. Congratulates the University of Illinois Fighting Illini men's tennis team, coach Craig Tiley, and associate head coach Bruce Berque on winning the 2003 NCAA team championship.
